source:
%%sql
-- Build the IMS historic info table

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.ims_dpia_dim (IMSDPIAID,
    DPIAIDLegacy,
    DPIAIDCoded,
    DPIAName,
    DPIAAssignedUserID,
    DPIAAssignedUserName,
    IMSDPIANumber,
    DPIAPM,
    DPIAContractOwner,
    DPIAOrganisationAreas,
    DPIALinkDraft,
    DPIADateRegistered,
    DPIADateToMHCLG,
    DPIADateToWelshGovernment,
    DPIADateReturnedByMHCLG,
    DPIADateReturnedByWelshGovernment,
    DPIADateReturnedByToIAOpm,
    DPIADateCompleted,
    DPIADateSignedOffAtRisk,
    DPIADateIAOAcceptedRisk,
    DPIAReviewPeriod,
    DPIALastCurrentAndAccurateDate,
    DPIANumberContainer,
    DPIAHelp,
    DPIADateToSDPM,
    DPIAResidualRisks,
    DPIADisagreement,
    IODecisionOutcome,
    IOScreeningOutcome,
    DPIAIMSINtegration,
    DPIADocumentID,
    DPIAControlledDocument,
    DPIADateNextReview,
    DPIADateImplementationRequirementsCommunication,
    DPIAUserID,
    DPIAInformationOwner,
    DPIAUser1ID,
    DPIAInformationOwner1,
    DPIAStatus,
    DPIAPersonResponsibleImplementation,
    DPIADateModified,
    SecurityGroups,
    DPIAAssignedUSerLink,
    CreatedBy,
    CreatedByLink,
    CreatedByName,
    DateEntered,
    Deleted,
    Description,
    ModifiedByName,
    ModifiedUserID,
    ModifiedUserLink,
    DPIAPriority,
    DPIAResolution,
    DPIAType,
    WorkLog,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive)

SELECT DISTINCT 
    Row_Number() over (Order by T1.ims_dpia_number NULLS LAST)      AS IMSDPIAID,
    IFNULL(T1.dpia_id, 'No Info')	AS	DPIAIDLegacy,
    IFNULL(T1.id, 'No Info')	AS	DPIAIDCoded,
    IFNULL(T1.name, 'No Info')	AS	DPIAName,
    IFNULL(T1.assigned_user_id, 'No Info')	AS	DPIAAssignedUserID,
    IFNULL(T1.assigned_user_name, 'No Info')	AS	DPIAAssignedUserName,
    IFNULL(T1.ims_dpia_number, 'No Info')	AS	IMSDPIANumber,
    IFNULL(T1.pm_c, 'No Info')	AS	DPIAPM,
    IFNULL(T1.contract_owner, 'No Info')	AS	DPIAContractOwner,
    IFNULL(T1.organisation_areas_c, 'No Info')	AS	DPIAOrganisationAreas,
    IFNULL(T1.link_draft_dpia_c, 'No Info')	AS	DPIALinkDraft,
    IFNULL(T1.date_registered, 'No Info')	AS	DPIADateRegistered,
    IFNULL(T1.date_to_mhclg_c, 'No Info')	AS	DPIADateToMHCLG,
    IFNULL(T1.date_to_welsh_gov_c, 'No Info')	AS	DPIADateToWelshGovernment,
    IFNULL(T1.date_returned_by_mhclg_c, 'No Info')	AS	DPIADateReturnedByMHCLG,
    IFNULL(T1.date_returned_by_welsh_gov_c, 'No Info')		AS	DPIADateReturnedByWelshGovernment,
    IFNULL(T1.date_returned_to_iao_pm_c, 'No Info')	AS	DPIADateReturnedByToIAOpm,
    IFNULL(T1.date_dpia_completed_c, 'No Info')	AS	DPIADateCompleted,
    IFNULL(T1.date_signed_off_at_risk_c	, 'No Info') AS	DPIADateSignedOffAtRisk,
    IFNULL(T1.date_iao_accepted_risks_c	, 'No Info') AS	DPIADateIAOAcceptedRisk,
    IFNULL(T1.review_period	, 'No Info') AS	DPIAReviewPeriod,
    IFNULL(T1.last_current_and_accurate_date, 'No Info')	AS	DPIALastCurrentAndAccurateDate,
    IFNULL(T1.dpia_num_container_c, 'No Info')	AS	DPIANumberContainer,
    IFNULL(T1.help	, 'No Info') AS	DPIAHelp,
    IFNULL(T1.date_to_sdpm, 'No Info')	AS	DPIADateToSDPM,
    IFNULL(T1.residual_risks, 'No Info')	AS	DPIAResidualRisks,
    IFNULL(T1.disagreement, 'No Info')	AS	DPIADisagreement,
    IFNULL(T1.io_decision_outcome, 'No Info')	AS	IODecisionOutcome,
    IFNULL(T1.io_screening_outcome, 'No Info')	AS	IOScreeningOutcome,
    IFNULL(T1.ims_dpia_ims_integration_1, 'No Info')	AS	DPIAIMSINtegration,
    IFNULL(T1.document_id_c	, 'No Info') AS	DPIADocumentID,
    IFNULL(T1.dpia_controlled_document_c, 'No Info')	AS	DPIAControlledDocument,
    IFNULL(T1.date_of_next_review_c, 'No Info')	AS	DPIADateNextReview,
    IFNULL(T1.date_implementation_reqs_com_c, 'No Info')	AS	DPIADateImplementationRequirementsCommunication,
    IFNULL(T1.user_id_c	, 'No Info') AS	DPIAUserID,
    IFNULL(T1.information_owner_c, 'No Info')	AS	DPIAInformationOwner,
    IFNULL(T1.user_id1_c	, 'No Info') AS	DPIAUser1ID,
    IFNULL(T1.information_expert_c, 'No Info')	AS	DPIAInformationOwner1,
    IFNULL(T1.status, 'No Info')	AS	DPIAStatus,
    IFNULL(T1.date_modified	, 'No Info') AS	DPIAPersonResponsibleImplementation,
    'No Info'			AS	DPIADateModified,
    'No Info'			AS	SecurityGroups,
    'No Info'			AS	DPIAAssignedUSerLink,
    'No Info'			AS	CreatedBy,
    'No Info'			AS	CreatedByLink,
    'No Info'			AS	CreatedByName,
    'No Info'			AS	DateEntered,
    'No Info'			AS	Deleted,
    'No Info'			AS	Description,
    'No Info'			AS	ModifiedByName,
    'No Info'			AS	ModifiedUserID,
    'No Info'			AS	ModifiedUserLink,
    'No Info'			AS	DPIAPriority,
    'No Info'			AS	DPIAResolution,
    'No Info'			AS	DPIAType,
    'No Info'			AS	WorkLog,
    7                                                                           AS SourceSystemID,
    First(to_timestamp(T1.expected_from))                                       AS IngestionDate,
    NULL                                                                        AS ValidTo,
    md5(concat(
        IFNULL(T1.dpia_id,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.id,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.name,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.assigned_user_id,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.assigned_user_name,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_dpia_number,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.pm_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.contract_owner,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.organisation_areas_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.link_draft_dpia_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.date_registered,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.date_to_mhclg_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.date_to_welsh_gov_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.date_returned_by_mhclg_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.date_returned_by_welsh_gov_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.date_returned_to_iao_pm_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.date_dpia_completed_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.date_signed_off_at_risk_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.date_iao_accepted_risks_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.review_period,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.last_current_and_accurate_date,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.dpia_num_container_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.help,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.date_to_sdpm,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.residual_risks,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.disagreement,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.io_decision_outcome,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.io_screening_outcome,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_dpia_ims_integration_1,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.document_id_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.dpia_controlled_document_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.date_of_next_review_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.date_implementation_reqs_com_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.user_id_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.information_owner_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.user_id1_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.information_expert_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.status,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.date_modified,'.'),
        '.', 
        '.', 
        '.', 
        '.', 
        '.', 
        '.', 
        '.', 
        '.', 
        '.', 
        '.', 
        '.', 
        '.', 
        '.', 
        '.', 
        '.', 
        '.'))                                                                   AS RowID,
    'Y'                                                                         AS IsActive
FROM odw_standardised_db.ims_dpia T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "IMS" = T2.Description
WHERE T1.ims_dpia_number IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY T1.dpia_id,
    T1.id,
    T1.name,
    T1.assigned_user_id,
    T1.assigned_user_name,
    T1.ims_dpia_number,
    T1.pm_c,
    T1.contract_owner,
    T1.organisation_areas_c,
    T1.link_draft_dpia_c,
    T1.date_registered,
    T1.date_to_mhclg_c,
    T1.date_to_welsh_gov_c,
    T1.date_returned_by_mhclg_c,
    T1.date_returned_by_welsh_gov_c,
    T1.date_returned_to_iao_pm_c,
    T1.date_dpia_completed_c,
    T1.date_signed_off_at_risk_c,
    T1.date_iao_accepted_risks_c,
    T1.review_period,
    T1.last_current_and_accurate_date,
    T1.dpia_num_container_c,
    T1.help,
    T1.date_to_sdpm,
    T1.residual_risks,
    T1.disagreement,
    T1.io_decision_outcome,
    T1.io_screening_outcome,
    T1.ims_dpia_ims_integration_1,
    T1.document_id_c,
    T1.dpia_controlled_document_c,
    T1.date_of_next_review_c,
    T1.date_implementation_reqs_com_c,
    T1.user_id_c,
    T1.information_owner_c,
    T1.user_id1_c,
    T1.information_expert_c,
    T1.status,
    T1.date_modified
